name: ZoomReportMeetingQa
description:
Retrieve a report on past Zoom meeting Q&A sessions.

Use this tool to access reports on questions asked and answered by participants in past Zoom meetings. Suitable for administrators with Pro plan or higher. Requires appropriate OAuth scopes.

parameters.name: meeting_identifier
parameters.description: Meeting's ID or UUID. Double-encode UUIDs if they begin with '/' or contain '//'.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID or universally unique ID (UUID). 
* If you provide a meeting ID, the API will return a response for the latest meeting instance. 
* If you provide a meeting UUID that begins with a `/` character or contains the `//` characters, you **must** double-encode the meeting UUID before making an API request.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom Meetings API.

parameters.name: meetingId
parameters.description:

* If you provide a meeting ID, the API will return a response for the latest meeting instance.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
